title: Rethinking Navigation
subtitle: Why a BottomNavBar fails on TV? How to adapt?

rightBullets.title: Designed for Thumbs
rightBullets.description: Bottom navigation bars are optimized for touch, not D-pad input.

rightBullets.title: Side Rail Navigation
rightBullets.description: TV UIs favor a left-side rail for easy up/down traversal with a remote.

rightBullets.title: Consistent Accessibility
rightBullets.description: This layout keeps navigation consistently available without crossing the screen.

rightBullets.title: Focus-First Mindset
rightBullets.description: It's a fundamental shift from 'touch-first' to 'focus-first' interaction design.

rightBullets.title: Maximizes Content Area
rightBullets.description: A vertical rail leaves more horizontal space for content rails and main focus is on it.
